Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: Great food and great service.

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: The best pizza and pasta in Amsterdam. Whats interesting the prices are low but the food is great. They are not Italian but be sure they cook your pasta better the the Italian .....the food is so CLEAN as well as the  people working there. Quick, clean en not expensive.

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: This is the best spot in the area for kapsalon. Amazing taste and price, saviours of many hungry nights. A blessing for the locals!

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: They have one of the best pizza's in Amsterdam. Try out Funghi with hot pepper(jalepeno), thank me later üëçüèø

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: Stayed for a week and ate here almost everyday! Nice and flexible menu and  cheap prices, really tasty food!

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: Although the food is freshly prepared and is pretty tasty for a range of pizzas, pastas, burgers and kapsalon, the service is slow and they don't seem to care about it too much.

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: Good pizza and really good price. But surprisingly long wait times, busy place. Best  for take away.

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
Review Text: All pizzas are 5 euros, good quality, nice range of other food as well.

Name: Steakhouse Pizzeria Bos en Lommer
